module.name: qBUtils
module.short: Collection of functions to help in formating things.
module.descr: A collections of utility functions to format various poerty values on this package.

element.name: FormatBytes
element.short: Formats Integer into Bytes, KiloBytes, MegaBytes, GigaBytes, TeraBytes and PetaBytes.

element.name: FormatBytes.aSize
element.short: The amount to be formatted into K/M/G/T/PB.

element.name: FormatBytes.Result
element.short: A string with the formatted K/M/G/T/PB.

element.name: FormatBytesPerSecond
element.short: Formats Integer into Bytes, KiloBytes, MegaBytes, GigaBytes, TeraBytes and PetaBytes per second.

element.name: FormatBytesPerSecond.aSize
element.short: The amount to be formatted into K/M/G/T/PB per second.

element.name: FormatBytesPerSecond.Result
element.short: A string with the formatted K/M/G/T/PB per second.

element.name: FormatTorrentState
element.short: Returns a human readable, capitalized String with the torrent status.

element.name: FormatTorrentState.Result
element.short: The capitalized String with a human readable torrent state.

element.name: FormatTrackerStatus.Result
element.short: A String with a human readable tracker status.
